excerpt.rendered:
This low-profile Lala Modern single Bed from Furniture of America will add a contemporary style to your child’s bedroom decor. This single bed is fully upholstered in Rexsin/velvet and features solid wood construction for stability and durability.

Features:

  • Includes 1 bed & 1 side Table
  • Dimensions:
    headboard
    width: 42 inches
    height: 48 inches
    length: 78 inches
  • Exact Color Options: Grey, White other options available
  • Modern design
  • Made of faux Resin/velvet, solid wood
  • The headboard, foot, and side rails are efficiently padded and tightly upholstered
  • Solid wood legs and framework offer a smooth appearance and durable support

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
